title: Zucchini Substitutes

items.name: Yellow squash
items.details: Most similar to zucchini in texture and taste. Best direct substitute.

items.name: Eggplant
items.details: Offers more firmness than zucchini. Good for dishes where you want a heartier texture.

items.name: Carrots
items.details: Firmer alternative that can work in many zucchini recipes.

items.name: Cucumber
items.details: Low-carb option. Best for raw or lightly cooked applications.

items.name: Bell peppers
items.details: Another low-carb option that works depending on the dish.

notes: Yellow squash is the closest substitute. For low-carb options, try cucumber or bell peppers. Choice depends on the specific dish being prepared.
